H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H7004.def: = smoke ◄ produced by burning sacrifice or incense ► in order to please God with its smell

H6883.def: = a condition that affects the skin or surface, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma, but also mildew on cloth and walls; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; clothes and buildings that are affected by it are unclean as well; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H2224.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H4696.def: = front part of the head; ≈ associated with stubbornness and lack of shame

H5838.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zadok<SDBH:צָדֹוק>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

glosses: to suffer from a skin disease
H6879.def: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H4696.def: = front part of the head; ≈ associated with stubbornness and lack of shame

H926.def: = action by which humans or divine beings act quickly

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H1765.def: = process by which an action is performed with more urge and speed than usual

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

30.gl: to suffer from a skin disease

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H5818.def: = man, also known as {L:Azariah<SDBH:עֲזַרְיָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}; tribe of Judah; ► father of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

glosses: to suffer from a skin disease
H6879.def: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4194.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1504.def: = causative action by which humans or deities divide objects into two halves

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3147.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, the judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} who is also known as {L:Jerubbaal<SDBH:יְרֻבַּעַל>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► known for the fable that he told about the inhabitants of {L:Shechem<SDBH:שְׁכֶם>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

12.gl: to suffer from a skin disease

34.gl: to suffer from a skin disease

H3499.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

H5818.def: = man, also known as {L:Azariah<SDBH:עֲזַרְיָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}; tribe of Judah; ► father of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

H7223.def: = state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

H314.def: = pertaining to being located behind other objects in a row

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H5818.def: = man, also known as {L:Azariah<SDBH:עֲזַרְיָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}; tribe of Judah; ► father of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H6900.def: = action by which the body of someone who died is laid down in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ not receiving a burial is considered a deep humiliation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6879.def: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H3147.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, the judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} who is also known as {L:Jerubbaal<SDBH:יְרֻבַּעַל>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► known for the fable that he told about the inhabitants of {L:Shechem<SDBH:שְׁכֶם>}

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

4.gl: to lie down with one's fathers > to rest with one's ancestors
